dmStatus.reasonForUpdate: Initial release of Skin Panels performance test procedure

levelledPara.title: Center Body Skin Panels Performance Test Procedure
levelledPara.para: This data module describes the performance test procedure for the Center Body Skin Panels (53-10-30).

levelledPara.title: Test Objectives
levelledPara.para: To verify that the Center Body Skin Panels meet all structural performance requirements, including stiffness, strength, and damage tolerance under expected operational conditions.

levelledPara.title: Prerequisites
levelledPara.para: Before performing this test, ensure the following conditions are met:

listItem.para: Panels are properly installed per installation procedures
All fasteners are correctly torqued
Test equipment is calibrated and operational
Safety precautions are in place

warning.warningAndCautionPara: Ensure all personnel are clear of the test area before applying pressure or loads.

caution.warningAndCautionPara: Monitor for any signs of panel buckling during the test.

levelledPara.title: Required Test Equipment
levelledPara.para: The following test equipment is required:

listItem.para: Pressure test system with capacity up to 2.5 bar
Strain gauges and data acquisition system
Out-of-plane displacement measurement system (laser or photogrammetry)
Pressure sensors and monitoring equipment
Acoustic emission monitoring system
Verify that all prerequisites have been met.
Install strain gauges at designated measurement points on the skin panels.
Set up displacement measurement system and establish baseline readings.
Seal the test section and verify leak tightness.
Pressurize the cabin section in increments of 0.25 bar up to 2.0 bar (design pressure).
Record strain, displacement, and acoustic emission data at each pressure increment.
Hold at maximum test pressure for 10 minutes.
Depressurize in 0.25 bar steps, recording data at each decrement.
Perform visual inspection for any signs of damage, delamination, or permanent deformation.

levelledPara.title: Acceptance Criteria
levelledPara.para: The Center Body Skin Panels pass the performance test if:

listItem.para: No visible cracks, delamination, fastener yielding, or permanent deformation observed
Maximum recorded strain is within design allowables
Maximum out-of-plane displacement is less than 5 mm at design pressure
Permanent set after depressurization is less than 0.1 mm
No acoustic emission events indicating structural damage

levelledPara.title: Data Recording
levelledPara.para: Record all test data in the approved test report form. Include:

listItem.para: Date, time, and test personnel
Panel serial numbers and configuration
Test equipment identification and calibration dates
All pressure, strain, displacement, and acoustic emission measurements
Pass/fail determination and signatures
